name: tourism
description:
The tourism command extracts hotels, attractions, and tourism infrastructure from OSM data. Categories include:

- Accommodation: hotels, hostels, campsites
- Attraction: theme parks, zoos, museums, viewpoints
- Information: tourist info, maps, guideposts

Includes star ratings and contact information.

options.-t, --type: Filter by type: hotel, museum, viewpoint, etc.
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: accommodation, attraction, information, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Tourism features with:
- tourism: Feature type
- name: Place name
- stars: Hotel star rating
- website, phone: Contact info
- Coordinates
